title: Fonts: "MYRNA" & "ALPHA HEADLINE"
content:
Does anyone know where I can find/purchase these fonts?   
   
MYRNA was designed by Alexander Gelman & David Heasty of Design Machine.   
   
ALPHA HEADLINE was designed by Cornel Windlin of Lineto
author: joslog

comments.content: Alpha Headline is, as far as I know, unavailable to the public. Stephen Coles might have more info on that.
Maybe I'm wrong, but Mitsubishi is using Alpha Headline exclusive for their ad's.

afaik alpha headline is available from lineto, but not at the moment ... see:   
   
 [http://www.lineto.com/content.html?ID=47&dir\_id=63](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016232818/http:/www.lineto.com/content.html?ID=47&dir_id=63)

i know there is a freefont with this alpha-headline-style. i'll post it later, when i'm back home.   
   
maybe this is an alternative [http://www.identifont.com/show?4W1](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016232818/http:/www.identifont.com/show?4W1)

this seems to be a rip off alpha headline.   
   
 [http://www.dafont.com/en/voir.php?libelle=Dev+Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016232818/http:/www.dafont.com/en/voir.php?libelle=Dev%2BGothic)
